question: Who was the first President of All-India Muslim League?
explanation: The All-India Muslim League was established in 1906. The party was formed in Dhaka. Its founders include  Khwaja Salimullah, Vikar-ul-Mulk, Syed Amir Ali, Syed Nabiullah, Khan Bahadur Ghulam , Mustafa Chowdhury, Sir Sultan Muhammad Shah (Aga Khan III) etc. Sir Sultan Muhammad Shah (Aga Khan III) was the first permanent president of the league.
